transforms.code:
points = []
	for i in range(0, value.getRowCount()):
		timestamp = value.getValueAt(i, 't_stamp')  # Assuming the timestamp column is labeled 'Timestamp'
		num_value = value.getValueAt(i, 'irms')  # Assuming the value column is labeled 'Value'
		points.append({'x': timestamp, 'y': num_value})
	return points
